title: How would you like to pay?
description: Are the days of paying by cash for a latte or a newspaper nearly gone? Alice and Neil discuss Neil's fondness for loose change...

vocabItems.word: behind the curvetap-and-go antenna ether fraud spending spree wearable techauthenticate
vocabItems.definition: behind the curvenot keeping up with current thinking or trendstap-and-go wireless payment technology using credit and debit cards, or mobile phonesantenna equipment used for sending and receiving radio or TV signalsether the air where electronic communication happensfraud getting money by cheating peoplespending spree doing a lot of shopping over a short period of timewearable techthings you can wear which combine payment and security technologyauthenticate(in general) prove something is true or genuine
